songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: R.A. The Rugged Man]
Ay yo, Rockstar, bust nuts, fuck sluts
Groupie whores on the tour bus, stick my tongue up they butts
Sex and drugs, starting riots in clubs
This is hip hop, fuck fighting, we let off slugs, the Rugged Man
You could call me Rugs, the pale-skinned Jimi Hendrix
Liquor hurting my appendix
Groupie in the back fucked the whole crew took at least ten dicks
Wanna cum bitch? Suck more dick for breakfast
Or whatever, snorting bugs and ants
Snorting everything in sight til they put me in the ambulance
Spitting blood like Gene Simmons, I'm heavy metal, hard rock
I got big balls, I'm Bon Scott
Screamin' Jay Hawkins, sleeping in coffins
Groupie bitches want abortions, it's costing a fortune
Live on stage, rock shit, pull the pistol out
Shoot at the crowd, duck! Try not to get hit
I'm a rock star!
songs.title: Rockstar
